title: (x) Faceted sans used for Mutua Madrile√±a Madrid Open promo - Foundry Gridnik {Rainer}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202073115im_/http:/typophile.com/files/madrid_3520.jpg)

Looking for an ID of the smaller font. I thought FFF Calypso but that is not correct.

The Madrid Open website is very well put together by Internetria:

[http://www.internetria.com/eng/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202073115/http:/www.internetria.com/eng/index.html "http://www.internetria.com/eng/index.html")

Thanks  
CM
author: cobramist

comments.content: Yep, but details on the J and the S etc. tell us it is not Blender, sorry.
